lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored two goals to lead Manchester United over visiting Portsmouth, 2-0, Wednesday and back into first place in the English Premier League. Manchester United (18-3-3) and Arsenal (17-1-6) each have 57 points; United leads on goal difference.
